content: this asymmetrical scarf will take out the chill of the day based on the stitch pattern in my amsterdam cowl pattern it comes in two sizes a petite wrap which makes a perfect little scarf or a larger size which gives more coverage like a shawl the pattern can be reversible so if gifted you won t see it worn the wrong way using a size 4 needle or whatever size you use to fit the gauge use your imagination to modify this pattern by switching colors after a full section is knit or knitting the yo k2tog row by using a contrast color of silk mohair instructions for this are included instructions for beading are also added finished dimensions small 22 x 47 large 32 x 64
